review: This is a great alternative to cable TV-there's nothing I miss after cutting the cable.  The apps I tend to use the most are PBS, MLB.com, Netflix, You Tube, Twit, Smithsonian, Bloomberg & CBS News.  As a Prime member there is a huge selection of music and movies.  Between Netflix, PBS and Amazon there is also a large selection of TV programs.  I've experienced no downside to this purchase.
author: RS

review: Have about 8 to 10 different media boxes.  This one comes in tied for first with the best box's I have ever used.  However, since you can no longer get the other box made this is a most excellent choice.  If you pay attention, check your choices on what you can do, this box can be and is for me a CABLE CUTTER.  With a regular antenna and the Fire TV box I no longer need cable.  It's not quite as easy as cable, but the trade off is if you want to watch something at 7:15 PM you can watch whatever you want, whenever you want on the Fire TV
